author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this zero-dependency package will auto-generate documentation for your npm-package with zero-config
name: apidoc-lite

scripts.publish-alias: VERSION=$(npm info $npm_package_name version); for ALIAS in api_doc apidocs api-doctor doctor-api npm-doc npmdoc; do utility2 shNpmPublishAs . $ALIAS $VERSION; utility2 shNpmTestPublished $ALIAS || exit $?; done
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 start
scripts.test: export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test test.js
